p: Recombinant ZIKV-80E protein was purified starting from a 2 L culture using Ni 2+-NTA affinity chromatography, under denaturing conditions essentially as reported earlier [43], with minor modifications. Details of purification are provided in Methods S1 ( Supplementary File). Purity was assessed by image analysis (Bio Rad Gel Doc EZ imager). Yields were typically ∼1 mg ZIKV-80E protein of ∼95% purity, per g wet weight of induced cell pellet.
